sentences.sentence: The Muon Counter is one of the important detectors in BES.
sentences.translation: 子探测器是安装在北京谱仪上面的重要的探测器之一。

sentences.sentence: Going this deep would help reduce the background signals from cosmic ray muon particles.
sentences.translation: 在这样的深度（实验）将有助于减少宇宙射线中的渺子介子造成的背景信号。

sentences.sentence: The point is to see if they are still muon-neutrinos when they arrive at Super-Kamiokande.
sentences.translation: T2K实验的目的是看当它们到达超级神冈探测器的时候，是否仍然是缪子中微子。
